feed.title: ZonePane Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve Accessibility for Reply-Context by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/885
  • Added documentation for setup behind reverse proxy with Apache by @jjschwarz in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/888
  • A CLI extention to help with manual updates, deletes and a self-destruct feature by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/867
  • It seems that Mastodon has issues with HTML in summaries by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/893

New Contributors

  • @jjschwarz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/888

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.2.2...3.2.3

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.2.5
entry.content:
• Fixed: Enable Mastodon Apps check
  • Fixed: Fediverse replies were not threaded properly

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.2.4...3.2.5

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Be more defensive when openssl by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/895
  • Header Images: fix cropping for users without the 'customize' capability by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/854
  • Follow Me/Followers: add inherit mode for dynamic templating by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/892
  • Enable Mastodon Apps: support profile editing, blog user by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/788
  • Add Screenshots of the Blocks by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/899
  • fix missing @ in Follow-Me block by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/898
  • Add replies collection by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/876
  • Content warnings! by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/900

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.2.5...3.3.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed PHP warnings by @pfefferle
  • Anonymous function lint by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/901

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.3.0...3.3.1
